name: Knight Moves
description:
Face off against an army of crimson pawns as the sole knight defending the azure kingdom. 

Features four modes of varying difficulty and an endless mode.

Also features the song "Covert Operations" by artisticdude.

Game mode titles roughly correspond to the following difficulty levels:

  • Preliminary: Easy
  • Siege: Normal
  • Gauntlet: Hard
  • Onslaught: Very Hard

Clear Gauntlet or Onslaught to unlock  Endless mode, in which you face off against a never-ending stream of enemy pawns.
